message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm a bit tight on budget and I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit over my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,500?
